body_html:
Officially we will only support the latest CUDA version. So we are currently actively working to upgrade to CUDA 9 and drop support for CUDA 8.
However, we will be happy to accept any contributions that fix the build issues on CUDA 7.5.

However, we will be happy to accept any contributions that fix the build issues on CUDA 7.5.
body:
Officially we will  only support the latest CUDA version. So we are currently actively working to upgrade to CUDA 9 and drop support for CUDA 8.
However, we will be happy to accept any contributions that fix the build issues on CUDA 7.5.
